scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint John the Evangelist on the island of Patmos, writing his Gospel. He is seated on a green mound surrounded by blue water. A golden eagle, a symbol of his evangelistic work, pecks at a scroll he is writing. To his left, a winged demon pours liquid from a jug into a quiver, representing temptation and worldly distractions. In the background, a lush landscape unfolds with trees, houses, and distant castles and churches, suggesting the world from which John is divinely inspired.
scene_interpretation: Saint John the Evangelist on Patmos
